tern
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • response_table

Wrap data generated from chgfbl_data into rtable format, to create a test result and change from baseline by visit summary table

Wrap data generated from chgfbl_data into rtable format, to create a test result and change from baseline by visit summary table

chgfbl_table(data)

Arguments

data

data generated by chgfbl_data function

Examples


library(tern)
library(random.cdisc.data)

ASL <- radam("ASL")

ANL <- merge(ASL, radam("AQS", ADSL = ASL)) %>%
   filter(PARAMCD == "FATIGI")

df <- chgfbl_data(data = ANL)
chgfbl_table(df)
#>                        ARM A                 ARM A                 ARM B                 ARM B     
#>                    Value at Visit         Change from          Value at Visit         Change from  
#>                        (N=41)               Baseline               (N=59)               Baseline   
#>                                              (N=41)                                      (N=59)    
#> ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#> WEEK 1
#>   n                      41                                          59                            
#>   Mean (SD)          -0.1 (0.8)                                   -0.1 (1)                         
#>   Median                -0.2                                        -0.1                           
#>   IQR               -0.76 - 0.41                                -0.62 - 0.56                       
#>   Min - Max         -1.82 - 1.59                                -2.16 - 1.91                       
#> 
#> WEEK 2
#>   n                      41                    41                    59                    59      
#>   Mean (SD)           0 (1.2)               0 (1.4)              -0.2 (1.1)             0 (1.6)    
#>   Median                -0.1                  -0.1                  -0.1                  -0.2     
#>   IQR               -0.87 - 0.58          -0.9 - 1.06           -0.97 - 0.59           -0.95 - 1   
#>   Min - Max         -1.71 - 3.59          -3.21 - 2.61          -2.45 - 2.95          -3.91 - 3.68 
#> 
#> WEEK 3
#>   n                      38                    38                    48                    48      
#>   Mean (SD)          -0.4 (1.1)            -0.5 (1.6)            -0.3 (0.8)            -0.1 (1.6)  
#>   Median                -0.3                  -0.7                  -0.1                  -0.1     
#>   IQR               -1.26 - 0.32          -1.7 - 0.73           -0.59 - 0.19          -1.23 - 0.82 
#>   Min - Max         -2.21 - 2.45          -2.69 - 4.14          -2.32 - 1.19            -3.6 - 3   
#> 
#> WEEK 4
#>   n                      34                    34                    38                    38      
#>   Mean (SD)           -0.1 (1)              0 (1.3)               -0.1 (1)             0.1 (1.4)   
#>   Median                -0.2                  0.4                   -0.1                  0.2      
#>   IQR               -0.59 - 0.4           -1.1 - 0.83           -0.65 - 0.46          -0.66 - 0.85
